addSupportedToken(address).details: Add support for a new token

batchTipToken(address[],address,uint256[.details: Batch tip multiple creators with same token

claimAllTokenRewards(address[]).details: Batch claim rewards for multiple tokens

getCreatorTokenBalance(address,address).details: Get creator's balance for a specific token

getCreatorTotalBalances(address,address[.details: Get creator's total balances across all tokens

getTokenRewards(address).details: Get total rewards distributed for a token

getTokenVolume(address).details: Get total volume for a token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

tipToken(address,address,uint256).details: Send tip in any supported token

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
